title: Eclipse Announces Solana-Powered Ethereum Rollup
description: Eclipse, an organization that allows for the construction of customizable rollups, has announced the architecture of its Eclipse mainnet, a Solana-powered Ethereum layer two (L2) scaling rollup. The rollup will benefit from using the Solana Virtual Machine as an execution layer, leveraging this blockchain’s various security and performance benefits. Eclipse Announces Ethereum L2 Using Solana […]

description: Ripple’s XRP Ledger hits an incredible 82 million closed ledgers and sees tremendous NFT activity.
